page.title: 15B'NESS/SOLWAY. FARMS & TRADE
page.content: {FARMS.}Mostly arable. Livestock are dairy and beef cattle and a few sheep. Major crops by area are Grass, Barley, Potatoes and Swedes. One smallholding has calf-rearing, poultry & goats. {MARKETS.}Harrison & Hetherington Marts at Carlisle & Wigton for livestock. Machinery, Equipment & Servicing from e.g.West Cumberland Farmers, Oliver & Snowdon, Lloyd's Tractors. {SHOPS.}Family shopping at Carlisle & Wigton. Local shops at Port Carlisle & Anthorn will deliver. Area served by travelling shops MILK & PAPERS- Daily - Carruthers .BREAD-twice weekly(Tues/ Fri)-Robertson,Weds/Sat-Waite.BUTCHER- Tues/Sat-Top Deal.GREENGROCER-Weds- Stockdale. GROCER-Tues-Gordon. FISH- Thurs-Palmer. FARM SUNDRIES & CLOTHING -monthly-Tynedale (Wigton). DRAPER-to farms only-quarterly-from Eaglesfield. .
